ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: Abdallah M. Samy received a fellowship from the Egyptian Fulbright Mission Program. We would also like to thank the Surveillance Ecology and Epidemiology Research Group (SEER-Group), Egypt and the BioDiVector group, Centro Regional de Investigacion en Salud Publica (CRISP), México. David A. Moo-Llanes would like to thank his wife Cristina Cruz Ordoñez and the Moo-Cruz family for their continuous support during this study. Abdallah M. Samy also acknowledges all support from his parents, his wife, and his daughters. Abdallah M. Samy is a member of the Egyptian Young Academy of Sciences (EYAS).
